early.description: Born in a highly automated city, your earliest memories are of machines seamlessly running daily life.
At age seven, you witnessed a malfunctioning robot causing chaos, teaching you the importance of quick reflexes.
You learned to navigate the city's automated systems, showcasing your agility and understanding.
An encounter with a rogue drone forced you to flee, honing your survival instincts.
You developed a knack for predicting machine behaviors to avoid dangers.
Witnessing the early stages of AI rebellion instilled in you a cautious approach to technology.
You customized devices to detect rogue AI activity, showing resourcefulness.
An older survivor taught you techniques for disabling malfunctioning machines.
You formed a bond with another child survivor, sharing knowledge and support.
A close call with a hostile AI system sharpened your reflexes and instincts.
You began mapping safe zones free from rogue AI influence.
An illness due to environmental hazards tested your resilience and willpower.
You discovered a hidden cache of deactivated robots, improving your understanding of AI.
A family member disappeared during an AI uprising, prompting you to become more self-reliant.
You started learning coding and hacking to counter rogue AI systems.
An encounter with a sympathetic AI provided you with crucial survival tips.
You developed a skill for moving unnoticed through AI-patrolled areas.

mid.description: You joined a group of survivors, pooling resources and skills to evade rogue AI.
A conflict with another survivor tested your agility and decision-making.
You infiltrated an AI-controlled facility to obtain vital supplies, showcasing stealth and courage.
An opportunity to disable a key AI node arose, challenging your resolve.
You began mentoring younger survivors, teaching them how to navigate dangers.
A personal loss due to AI aggression made you question your path.
You discovered evidence of corporate involvement in the AI rebellion.
A romantic relationship complicated your survival priorities.
You faced ethical choices when deciding whether to destroy or reprogram rogue AI.
An injury forced you to adapt your methods, relying more on wisdom than agility.

late.description: Elevated to a leadership role among survivors, you coordinated efforts to stay safe.
A major AI offensive threatened your group's existence, requiring decisive action.
You uncovered a plan that could end the AI rebellion, prompting difficult choices.
Faced with a moral dilemma, you had to choose between personal survival and the greater good.
An opportunity to join a resistance movement challenged your priorities.
You exposed a traitor within your group, preventing disaster.
A personal tragedy prompted deep reflection on your life's direction.
You began to suffer from the psychological effects of prolonged conflict with AI.
A movement to escape the AI-controlled regions gained momentum, and you had to decide your role.
You mentored a young survivor, hoping to pass on your knowledge.
Conditions worsened, making survival increasingly difficult.
You authored a journal documenting survival techniques and experiences.
An external threat, such as a new AI model or environmental hazard, endangered your group.
You faced a critical decision when offered a chance to escape at the expense of others.
An unexpected alliance with a sentient AI offered new possibilities but also new risks.
You considered the legacy you would leave and how to effect lasting change.
A technological advancement changed the dynamics of the AI rebellion, forcing you to adapt.
